Thrice a week, 85-year-old Mdm Lo can be found at "Willing Hearts", a non-affiliated charity that operates a soup kitchen that prepares, cooks and distributes more than 6000 daily meals to the needy families. (重)建麟很关注独居老人，发现到他们其中有些可能是因为健康或精神状况不佳，导致居住环境很恶劣，甚至垃圾堆积成山。他觉得无论贫富，每个人都应该有个像样的家，于是便和几个朋友成立了一个团体，帮忙无依无靠的老人清理家居，为他们还原一个整洁、卫生的家。Mdm Lo虽然已经高龄85，但她每周三天都会定时到"愿之心"的中央厨房报到，帮忙切菜。厨房的工作非常繁重，每天得准备六千份饭盒供应给不同的慈善团体，再分发给低收入家庭或老人。.

Fang Yi suspects that Guonan has deliberately targeted estates that are rumoured to be haunted so that he would not arouse any suspicions whenever he carried out a murder. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(重)Joe查到张国南在短短几年内已经在五个屋村做过保安。方怡怀疑张国南故意到闹鬼的屋村工作，杀人后，故意让外界误以为那些死者都是自杀的，然后为他人下续命降。忠Sir认同方怡的看法，下令请张国南到警局问话。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。.

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Lee Teng is in his hometown, Taiwan, to visit a Singaporean student studying at the National Chengchi University. He attends classes and extracurricular activities with her to learn more about the media learning environment in Taiwan and how overseas students work towards their dreams. (重)《求学地图》这一集主持人李腾来到故乡台湾，探访一位在政治大学修读传播学系的新加坡学生，走入她的校园生活，一起上课、参加课外活动，了解了台湾传播教育的学习环境，也看到留学生为梦想奋斗的点点滴滴。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 44
programme.desc: (R) Zhenshu tells Shuzi and Meici that she left home previously in the hope that Xiuqing and Xiantai can live happily ever after. However, she realises that Xiuqing is not happier following her departure. Zhenshu thus decides to move back home despite objections from Shuzi and Meici. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真淑指当初离家是希望秀卿能跟贤泰过着幸福的日子，后来才发现两人为了她的离开而过得很辛苦。真淑于是不顾淑子和美慈的反对，搬回家住。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Fengxi receives an anonymous message that her boyfriend is cheating on her and rushes over, wanting to catch her boyfriend in the act. On the subway, she gets molested and mistakes Zhixu for the molester. Fengxi accuses Zhixu publicly and embarrasses Zhixu. Later on, Zhixu runs into Fengxi quarrelling with her boyfriend at the hotel lobby and witnesses her being dumped by her boyfriend. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奉熙收到男友偷吃的匿名短信后赶紧前去捉奸，却在地铁里被性骚扰。不明真相的她错把站在一旁的智旭当成了侵犯她的变态者，当众指责智旭，让智旭尴尬万分。之后智旭冤家路窄地见到她与男友熙俊在酒店大堂争吵和被男友抛弃的情景。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 45
programme.desc: It turns out that similar to Daojing, Suluo has also given her heart away to someone else, but is unable to pursue her happiness due to her family's background. Daojing helps Suluo leave South Korea and elope with her boyfriend. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)原来素萝也有个心爱的男人在美国等着她，但因为出生于有权势的家族，所以跟道京一样无法随意地照自己的心走。道京帮素萝成功离开韩国，跟男友私奔。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 46
programme.desc: Yanghao feels betrayed by Daojing and orders everyone at home not to give any help to Daojing. Taixiu suspects that he has cancer when he coughs out blood. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)阳浩觉得自己被道京背叛，于是下令全家人不能接济道京。太修突然吐血，怀疑自己患癌。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 4
programme.desc: Shandong's Liangshan was the setting for "The Water Margin" classic novel, which depicted the grand journey of 108 heroes. Host Danny Yeo immerses in this epic literary adventure and discovers the feasts and flavours penned in the novel. 古典名著《水浒传》里108位英雄，缔造出世代津津乐道的传奇事迹。豪情万丈的英雄气息，在中国山东梁山，不只可以感受得到，也品尝得到。这一集，主持人杨君伟登上梁山，赴一场精美绝伦的水浒飨宴。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 17
programme.desc: Wei Yun discovers that the article she has written has been taken down. This affects her confidence level and harbours the thought of resigning from her job. Eric notices Wei Yun packing her luggage and points out that she is only avoiding the issue. Wei Yun criticises Eric for just wanting to return to the bank to earn a stable income by being a white-collar professional. Eric is hurt and leaves, leaving Wei Yun feeling vexed. (PG)维芸发觉自己写的新闻稿被撤下，信心被打击，萌生辞职的念头。她在收拾行李时被Eric看见，Eric理智地点出维芸是在逃避。维芸批评Eric也只不过想回银行当个安稳的白领阶级而已，Eric受伤离开，留下维芸独自懊恼。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Tai Hu also wanted a share in the secret recipe. He approached Xiaorong and proposed to buy over Nanyang eatery. Tai Hu used his gift and managed to cook the signature Laksa with Meiwei. They let Xiaorong taste their Laksa but she rejected their Laksa and insisted on selling the eatery to Tai Hu. (PG)(重)三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The Rohingya is a stateless ethnic minority. The ethnic cleansing has resulted in their homes being destroyed and millions of people fleeing away amid a frenzy of massacre. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)罗兴亚人，是一种没有身份的背叛轻离。一场民族清洗，百万人落荒而逃，家园被毁，无情被杀。到底罗兴亚人该往哪里去？回去家乡，就是否意味着能回归平静的生活？遭遇生离死别，一颗颠沛流离的心，又该何处安放呢？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 45
programme.desc: (R) Zhenshu and Xiuqing go to spa together. They lose track of time and forget to bring Xiaoxun home from school. Yingxin is mad with Zhenshu for neglecting Xiaoxun. Xiantai deliberately shouts at Xiuqing to stop Yingxin from scolding Zhenshu further. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真淑和秀卿一起去汗蒸幕，睡过了头，忘了接小勋回家。英心气真淑忽略了生病的小勋，贤泰为了阻止英心继续对真淑发火，于是故意大声骂秀卿。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Fengxi comes home from shopping and stumbles over something. She is shocked to find her ex-boyfriend Xijun lying on the floor with blood all over his body. As there was a blackout when Fengxi was shopping, no video recording is available. Furthermore, the shopkeeper of the supermarket cannot remember Fengxi. As Fengxi cannot provide an alibi, she becomes the main suspect of the murder. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奉熙外出购物回到家时被东西绊倒，她惊见躺在地上浑身是血的前男友熙俊。因刚才奉熙出外购物时整个街道突然停电，所以没有交易记录，再加上超市小哥不记得她的样子，没有证据可证明她不是杀害熙俊的凶手；顿时成了一名杀人嫌犯。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 47
programme.desc: Zhi-an confesses to Xianyu He that she has fallen for Daojing and is thus saddened by the news of Daojing being posted to Europe. Zhi-an is shocked to see Daojing at the share house. Not only is Daojing not going to Europe, he is also going to start staying at the share house. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知安向鲜于赫承认自己爱上道京，所以知道他被调到欧洲工作后，觉得很伤心。才大哭一场的知安回到share house发现道京不但不打算到欧洲分公司去，而且还在share house租了一个床位。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 48
programme.desc: Xiuya contemplates going for an abortion when she finds out that she is pregnant. Taixiu is initially very fearful when he suspects that he has stomach cancer. Later on however, he has a change of mood when he realises that death can also be a chance to rest. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)秀雅发现自己怀孕了，但因为担心她和知泰无法承担孩子的养育费，所以考虑堕胎。太修怀疑自己怀上胃癌，原本很害怕，但后来觉得死亡也可以是休息的一种方式，就释怀不少。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 6
programme.desc: Along the Laotian banks of the mighty Mekong are pockets of underprivileged, isolated and mosquito-infested villages. The people here live a subsistence lifestyle and apart from the river, have no access to the outside world. There are no roads, no cars, no phones, no internet and no distributed electricity. Host Carla Dunareanu partners with Bridging the Gap Mekong Trust to travel upriver to a remote village in her special delivery of mosquito-nets and precious medical supplies. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 6
programme.desc: You can buy machines to automate but what happens when these machines do not even exist? Bjorn meets Alson Teo of Stamfles and Cheng Yew Heng, both of whom have spent years and a fortune in building and perfecting machines to automate their products to scale up their food production. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 18
programme.desc: Eric tells Wei Yun that her supervisor was blackmailed over nude photos and had to forsake journalistic ethics and integrity as a result. Wei Yun is touched when Eric says he is willing to be interviewed by her for the hacking case, even if it means that he is unable to return to work at the bank. Eric intends to confess his feelings to Wei Yun but backs out in the end. (PG-部分画面令人不安)Eric告诉维芸，她报社的主管侯主任是受裸照威胁，才会抛弃新闻人的正义。Eric说自己能让维芸采访，写出盗领案的完整报道，就算无法回去银行上班也没关系，维芸感动。Eric打算想向维芸告白，但话始终没有说出口。.

programme.title: 购物乐 (商业资讯) JML Home Shopping - Infomercial
买卖 Business As Usual - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In Japan's highly stressful environment, people lead lonely yet appearance-based lives, and this has created a demand for a "human rental" company. These professional actors can play as a client's family member, a friend and even a sleeping partner. What's the deal behind these rental services? (PG)(重)日本生活压力大，孤独寂寞又注重面子，在生活上有许多不能忍受的空缺与遗憾。因此，衍生了一种"租人"公司，提供各种职业演员，扮演客户生活中的任何角色，从租妻到家中来煮饭聊天到不涉及性服务的陪睡伴侣，纯粹帮寂寞的都市人排遣孤寂无助。租赁情感服务，究竟是怎么样的奇特买卖？.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 寂寞鱼•听见 A Lonely Fish - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Jing Xuan wakes up to the news of her parents' passing and is also injured in the car accident. Unable to accept the fact, thinking that her wilfulness was the cause of her parents' death, Jing Xuan attempts suicide. She, however, manages to survive with the help of Yi Kai, who is a doctor at the hospital. Yi Kai comforts Jing Xuan and is there for her whenever she needs someone. Due to common topics, they become good friends. Yi Kai also helps Jing Xuan to step out of her comfort zone and play. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)静萱醒来后得知父母在车祸中去世，自己也受了伤。静萱无法接受，认为是自己的任性害死了他们。静萱觉得没有活下去的意义，在医院天台想自杀，幸好被实习医生亦凯救了。亦凯陪在静萱的身边，两人聊得来，也有共同的话题，建立了特别的关系。亦凯还让静萱踏出自己的舒适圈，在医院和小朋友玩耍。静萱还做了营养午餐给亦凯，感谢他。静萱和亦凯也渐渐对彼此产生好感，让静萱有活下去的勇气。静萱有了亦凯，Kora、Kora母亲Ann的支持和陪伴，最后想通了，决定要好好活下去。三个星期后，静萱出院，在家里整理父母的遗物，发现了他们送给她的最后一份生日礼物。静萱很伤心，边哭泣边戴上了项链，之后便听到了奇怪的声音。声音不知道从哪里来，而且很模糊，让静萱感到很害怕…….

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 46
programme.desc: (R) Xiantai comes across a DNA report in Meici's room and discovers the relationship between Zhenshu and Xiuqing. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰和秀卿带小勋到朴家吃饭。小勋到美慈的房间玩，打翻了垃圾桶。贤泰整理时发现了真淑和秀卿的亲子鉴定报告。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) While Zhixu and head prosecutor Fang were investigating the murder case at Fengxi's house, Fang receives a call that someone has found the suspected murder weapon in a park. At the same time, Zhixu finds a similar knife under Fengxi's refrigerator. He smells something fishy so he sends someone to examine the DNA on both the weapons. Ep 23金成范在说出材韩死的实情时，有人开车将他撞到。秀贤与行凶者在打斗的时候，海英帮她挡了一枪。帮秀贤挡枪的海英，即使处于意识不清的情况下也不放弃一定要救材韩的迫切信念，拼命拿起无线对讲机。。。。。。Ep 24由于海英利用对讲机改变了过去，海英的父母在得知善宇被冤枉之后没有离婚，陪伴海英长大。在治守开枪要杀害李材韩的时候，警察赶到。获救后的材韩紧紧地拥抱了车秀贤。。。。。。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 Sound Of My Dream S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Sound Of My Dream is a music program which invites Chinese pop singers to challenge musicians and other singers to pit their skills. Mentors and singers put in their best to show the essence of music, regardless of the outcome. (重)《梦想的声音》（原《声音的战争》）是一档由浙江卫视所打造的音乐节目，邀请到华语乐坛歌手面对面进行“歌艺过招”，导师与素人歌手抛开所有包袱，毫无保留的相互讨教，竭尽所能展现出音乐本质。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 11
programme.desc: Shopping need not be confined to cookie-cutter malls! This week, Peifen shops at little-known, hole-in-the wall shops. Ooooh, what bounty will Peifen grab, from her underground shopping experience? Such as a 1930s perfumery house in Arab Street! And a blink-and-you-miss spice grinder in Little India. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 4
programme.desc: Shandong's Liangshan was the setting for "The Water Margin" classic novel, which depicted the grand journey of 108 heroes. Host Danny Yeo immerses in this epic literary adventure and discovers the feasts and flavours penned in the novel. 古典名著《水浒传》里108位英雄，缔造出世代津津乐道的传奇事迹。豪情万丈的英雄气息，在中国山东梁山，不只可以感受得到，也品尝得到。这一集，主持人杨君伟登上梁山，赴一场精美绝伦的水浒飨宴。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 7
programme.desc: Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 6
programme.desc: Along the Laotian banks of the mighty Mekong are pockets of underprivileged, isolated and mosquito-infested villages. The people here live a subsistence lifestyle and apart from the river, have no access to the outside world. There are no roads, no cars, no phones, no internet and no distributed electricity. Host Carla Dunareanu partners with Bridging the Gap Mekong Trust to travel upriver to a remote village in her special delivery of mosquito-nets and precious medical supplies. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 6
programme.desc: You can buy machines to automate but what happens when these machines do not even exist? Bjorn meets Alson Teo of Stamfles and Cheng Yew Heng, both of whom have spent years and a fortune in building and perfecting machines to automate their products to scale up their food production. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 21
programme.desc: Ep 21: Guixi slaps Yuzhen and orders him to end his relationship with Yiyuan immediately. However, the more that Yuzhen is humiliated, the more he wants to hold on to Yiyuan. Ep 21: 贵熙听说艺苑要到宇真家拜访，愤怒地到医院警告宇真立刻结束跟艺苑的关系，否则让他身败名裂，还打了宇真一巴掌。宇真越是被羞辱，就越想紧抓住艺苑。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 22
programme.desc: Ep 22: Haixiu brings Meina and Tong Bai home. Rongxin thinks Meina is in cahoots with the fraudulent salesmen previously and starts a quarrel with Meina immediately. Haixiu tells Yuzhen that she has moved into his house with her family. Yuzhen reprimands Haixiu for lying to Xiuzi. Ep 22: 海秀带美娜和桐白回家。容心认得美娜是之前假药事件的外国小姐，立即跟美娜和海秀起争执。海秀知道家人多的事实不可能长期隐瞒，于是向宇真承认自己带着家人们搬到他家了。宇真怪海秀欺骗秀子。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 6
programme.desc: Xiu Hao goes to Sharon s tailor shop to order some clothes for Haila. Xiu Hao reveals to Haila that he is the person whom her father brought home when they are young. 秀浩到雪伦洋服店订做衣服给海拉。秀浩告知海拉他是小时候海拉父亲带回来照顾的男孩。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 7
programme.desc: Bai Xi invites Xiu Hao and Haila to an event in her bookshop. She relates a story but the couple is not aware she is talking about their past. 百熙邀请秀浩与海拉到她书店的活动，并分享他们的过去，但两人却不知道这是他们的前世故事。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.desc: Zhenyu is born with super memory. He gets to know the passionate and cheerful Renya in a bus theft case. Jingya is Zhenyu's neighbour who earns a living through singing. One day, Jingya goes missing after going to Guiwan's secret party. Zhenyu's father Zaihe, who has severe Alzheimer's disease, finds Jingya's body when he lost his way. 振宇拥有与生俱来的超强记忆力，因一次巴士偷窃意外结识了热心开朗的仁雅。静雅是振宇的邻居，因家境贫穷经常外出唱歌赚钱。这天静雅被邀请参加圭万的秘密派对后下落不明。振宇的父亲载赫身患严重阿兹海默症，失忆迷路的他意外发现了静雅的尸体。。。。。。.

However, there are a few chicken rice stalls which are well-known and make people to queue patiently for it. What are the trade secrets behind to make these stalls to become successful in the competitive market? 鸡饭，是旅客到访新加坡必吃的本地美食之一。虽然这里的鸡饭档口不尽其数，个个都标榜售卖正宗海南鸡饭，但却只有那么几家的鸡饭远近驰名，让人甘愿为它排队等候，甚至百吃不厌。在竞争激烈的鸡饭界中，这几家鸡饭档口究竟隐藏了什么料理的秘密呢？.

This debate between the sexes brings out the true meaning of marriage! 俗话说："女人怕嫁错郎"! 女人最想要嫁的是怎样的男人？女人对男人的期许是不是因为结婚后而会逐渐改变？女人对男人有要求，难道男人就不想要和女人有共同步伐吗？这场男女交锋的"辩论"将让大家了解婚姻的真谛！.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 1
programme.desc: Aidan is a compulsive liar who doesn't bat an eyelid when it comes to spinning lies. But he didn't always used to be like this. In fact, he never told a lie when he was young but when his late mother was dying, he decided to lie to her. It was his first lie and he's never stopped since. One by one, Aidan's lies become true; a beautiful lady who is a complete stranger passionately kisses him. Aidan complains to De Hua that she stole his first kiss and the two friends get drunk. 赵毅刚（Aidan） 是个爱说谎的家伙，说谎不眨眼。但其实他在小时候根本不会说谎，因为要让过世前的母亲安息，他开始说了他人生的第一个谎话，从此万劫不复。。。 谎话接二连三成真，Aidan更因说谎，被陌生美女强吻了自己；Aidan对德华控诉自己初吻被夺，买醉回家的Aidan发现家中出现怪异现象，怀疑床上藏着人，Aidan战战兢兢上前准备掀开被单。。。.
